Headline: Temporary #21 Cermak Reroute at Cermak/Lombard
ShortDescription: #21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Cermak/Lombard.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Cermak, Austin, 16th, Ridgeland, Cermak, and over regular route: due to, street blockage near Cermak/Lombard.

Allow extra travel time.
